steps.value: Given I am on main application page
When I change window size to `${resolution}`
When I go to relative URL `/my-cases`
When I wait until element located by `caseSensitiveText(There are no cases at the moment.)` appears
When I click on element located by `tagName(button)->filter.textPart(Create New Case)`
When I wait until element located by `caseSensitiveText(Select Case Type)` appears
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/new-case`

scenarios.title: check create new episode of care button

steps.value: When I go to relative URL `/new-case`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-new-case-card-button)->filter.index(1)`
When I wait until element located by `testId(jnj-save-button)` appears
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/new-case/episode-of-care`

steps: When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-close-button)`
When I click on element located by `testId(<button-id>)`

steps.value: When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-close-button)`
When I click on element located by `testId(((jnj-close-icon-confirm-dialog)))`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/new-case/episode-of-care`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-close-button)`
When I click on element located by `testId(((jnj-button-confirm-confirm-dialog)))`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/new-case/episode-of-care`

scenarios.title: check cancel pop-up

steps.value: When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-close-button)`
When I change context to element located by `testId(jnj-confirm-dialog)`
When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-cancel-new-case-pop-up`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-button-reject-confirm-dialog)`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/new-case`
